> Disallows using Django’s convenience form rendering helpers, for which the markup isn’t screen-reader-friendly
>
> User impact: **Serious**

This rule supports the following configuration:

<Tabs
  groupId="config-language"
  defaultValue="toml"

  <TabItem value="toml">
    <CodeSnippet
      snippet={`# Forms cannot be rendered with as_table, as_ul, or as_p\ndjango_forms_rendering = true\n# Allows as_p\ndjango_forms_rendering = "as_p"`}
      annotations={[]}
      lang="toml"
    />
  </TabItem>
  <TabItem value="shell">
    <CodeSnippet
      snippet={`# Forms cannot be rendered with as_table, as_ul, or as_p\ncurlylint --rule 'django_forms_rendering: true' .\n# Allows as_p\ncurlylint --rule 'django_forms_rendering: "as_p"' .`}
      annotations={[]}
      lang="shell"
    />
  </TabItem>
</Tabs>
